name: Lost Lab
description:
Lost Lab is a exploration horror in which you, the player, are a prisoner forced to risk your life in order to become free again.

You are tasked with carrying out a mission for a secret government agency. You must retrieve artefacts from a anomaly called the Lost Lab.

All you have is a scanner to detect the environment and a radar to locate the artefacts near by. 

You're not the first and you won't be the last... Good luck!

Controls: 

Scanner:

  • Left Mouse Button (Hold) - Normal Scan
  • Right Mouse Button (Click) - Big area scan
  • Mouse scroll wheel - Change normal scan radius

Movement

  • WSAD - Move
  • Space - Jump

General:

  • Tab - Map
  • Esc - Pause

Map:

  • Click left mouse button drag - Rotate camera
  • Right click mouse button drag - Move camera
  • Scroll wheel - Zoom In/Out

This is just a demo. If enough people will support the project I will continue development.
